bioconda.name: novoalign
bioconda.summary: Powerful tool designed for mapping of short reads onto a reference genome from Illumina, Ion Torrent, and 454 NGS platforms

biocontainers.name: novoalign
biocontainers.summary: Powerful tool designed for mapping of short reads onto a reference genome from Illumina, Ion Torrent, and 454 NGS platforms

biotools.summary: Tool designed for mapping short reads from Illumina, IonTorrent or 454 platforms onto a reference genome. This is a commercial product.

bioschemas.name: Novoalign
bioschemas.summary: Tool designed for mapping short reads from Illumina, IonTorrent or 454 platforms onto a reference genome. This is a commercial product.
